<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="I.-Introduction">I. Introduction<a class="anchor-link" href="#I.-Introduction">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Insights-into-my-fitness-journey-(2012---17)">Insights into my fitness journey (2012 - 17)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Insights-into-my-fitness-journey-(2012---17)">¶</a></h3><p>I have been an avid runner and fitness enthusiast for the past 5 years, and what has been a fun part of all those is how much we can learn about ourselves from exploring the data we capture.</p>
<p>I started capturing data about myself around the year 2012, which was when we saw the advent of wearable devices, and have always wanted to carry out an analysis to gain insights about my running patterns, my strength training schedules, my diet logs and any other metadata which I can collect about myself like the Heart Rate, Cadence for runs and also the step counts.</p>
<p>About <strong><a href="http://quantifiedself.com/">Quantified Self</a></strong> : When learning about the ways to explore about the data you capture, I came across the term Quantified Self and have been following the blog ever since. Its just amazing how capturing and analyzing data about yourself can actually help me make data driven decision to improve your lifestyle and so many people are joining this movement and bringing a data-driven change to improve their lives.</p>
<p><strong> Questions which I would like to answer in my project analysis are as follows : </strong></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="#section1">How much time have I spent on various activities like Running, Treadmill Running, Strength Training Sessions, Cycling and Cardio Sessions?</a></li>
<li><a href="#section2">What is a count of the activities and how do they vary across specific months over the span of 5 years?</a></li>
<li><a href="#section3">Activity Day Analysis : What has been the most active day in the week and the distribution of activities across specific days of a week</a></li>
<li><a href="#section4">Calorie Analysis : An analysis of the distribution of calories burnt during activities, along with the distribution of calories burnt during specific activities and detecting outliers (which I am happy about)</a></li>
<li><a href="#section6">How many calories have I burnt in total for every activity and see any trends for the activities across the years 2012-2017? <strong>Interactive Plot using D3.js</strong></a></li>
<li><a href="#section7">What is the hour of the day that I usually do the activities and how has it changed over the past 5 years? It will help me relive the changes that have happened in my life and how they have affected my schedules. <strong>Interactive Plot using D3.js</strong></a></li>
<li><a href="#section8">Analyzing the trend of how the Activity minutes vary across the months for years 2012-2016. <strong>Interactive D3.js visualization</strong></a></li>
<li><a href="#section9">Analyzing the trend of how my running mileage varies across the months for the year data 2012-2016. <strong>Interactive Plot using D3.js</strong></a></li>
<li><a href="#section10">Analysis of the total minutes spent on each activity type during the months in year 2012-17</a></li>
<li><a href="#section11">Analyzing average calories burnt for every activity type during the months of years 2012-17</a></li>
<li><a href="#section12">Analyzing average heart rate based activity levels and its variation along the aggregated days of the week and aggregated activity types</a></li>
</ul>
<p>I do take inspiration from the <a href="http://quantifiedself.com/running/">Quantified Self Running archives</a> and will try and do an analysis on all these aspects about my data.</p>
<p><strong> Where the reader can find the data? </strong>
I would like to share the data captured about all my activities if someone wants to analyze it. The data used for this project is hosted on Github at this <a href="https://github.com/anujk3/edav-final-project/tree/master/data">link</a>. This code file has also been hosted on Github and can be accessed at this <a href="https://github.com/anujk3/edav-final-project/blob/master/Project_ak3979.ipynb">link</a>. You can always mail me to get the most updated data at <strong> <code>anujk3@gmail.com</code> </strong>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="II.-Team">II. Team<a class="anchor-link" href="#II.-Team">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I will be working <strong>by myself</strong> on my dataset and gaining insights through the analysis I do. The stages of the project have been highlighted below:</p>
<ul>
<li>I had to go to the activities page on Garmin and download around 22 pages of data one by one which had all the data in a csv format. Sadly, Garmin does not offer an API like fitbit which makes it difficult to gather any data for analysis.</li>
<li>After getting the data from Garmin, the next part was combining all the csv files together and converting it into a dataframe which can be analyzed further. All the processing was done in python using pandas.</li>
<li>The initial processing involved cleaning the data, remove extraneous activities like walking, swimming etc. which I haven't tracked a lot, correcting the data errors, correcting datetime fields for the ease of datetime analysis.</li>
<li>After initial cleaning of data, I was focussed on data transformations to add dervied columns to the data which can be useful to exploratory data analysis.</li>
<li>The next part was focussed on doing an analysis of missing values followed by the existing continuous and discrete variables in the dataset which involed an analysis of the missing values along with an analysis of important univariate distributions of continuous columns and multivariate analysis of continuous variables.</li>
<li>The next part was to figure out the important questions which I can answer using the dataset and work on specific problems to come with relevant visualizations for explaning them.</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Programming-Language-Used-:">Programming Language Used :<a class="anchor-link" href="#Programming-Language-Used-:">¶</a></h3><p>Something I am really passionate about is doing data analysis work and Python has been my go to language for it. Through the course Exploratory Data Analysis and Visualizations, Prof. Joyce Robbins did help me realize how even <code>R</code> can help in quickly analyzing the data and actually the best part about <code>R</code> for me was getting to learn about <code>ggplot</code>.</p>
<p>I still prefer using Python as my language for data analysis but hacked my way to use ggplot within the Python Analysis and will be doing most of my dataframe analysis in <code>Python</code> and making plots with <code>ggplot</code>, but all within a <code>Python Notebook</code>.</p>
<p>I will also be working on interactive visualizations using <code>D3.js</code> and whenever possible <code>matplotlib within Python</code> along with <code>seaborn</code>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="III.-Analysis-of-Data-Quality">III. Analysis of Data Quality<a class="anchor-link" href="#III.-Analysis-of-Data-Quality">¶</a></h2>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="i.-Import-Statements-and-Setup">i. Import Statements and Setup<a class="anchor-link" href="#i.-Import-Statements-and-Setup">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">math</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">warnings</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">numpy</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">np</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">rpy2.robjects</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">pandas2ri</span>
<span class="n">pandas2ri</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activate</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">warnings</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">filterwarnings</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ignore'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">matplotlib.pyplot</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">plt</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">seaborn</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">sns</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rcParams</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"figure.figsize"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">20</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="o">%</span><span class="k">reload_ext</span> rpy2.ipython
<span class="o">%</span><span class="k">matplotlib</span> inline
<span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">options</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">display</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">max_rows</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">999</span>
<span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_style</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"white"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">IPython.core.display</span> <span class="k">import</span> <span class="n">HTML</span>
<span class="n">HTML</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"""</span>
<span class="s2"><style></span>
<span class="s2">.output_png {</span>
<span class="s2">    display: table-cell;</span>
<span class="s2">    text-align: center;</span>
<span class="s2">    vertical-align: middle;</span>

<span class="s2">    }</span>
<span class="s2"></style></span>
<span class="s2">"""</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[1]:</div>
<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">
<style>
.output_png {
    display: table-cell;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: middle;

    }
</style>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="ii.-Load-Data">ii. Load Data<a class="anchor-link" href="#ii.-Load-Data">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"data/a"</span>

<span class="n">frame</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">list_</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">27</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">file_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">path</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">".csv"</span>
    <span class="c1">#print(file_path)</span>
    <span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">file_path</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">index_col</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">header</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">skiprows</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">list_</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">df</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="n">frame</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">concat</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">list_</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"index"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">" Favorite"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Unnamed: 11"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#frame.columns</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">col_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'activityType'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'startTime'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'activityTime'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'actDistance'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'elevationGain'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'avgSpeed'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'avgHR'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'maxHR'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
            <span class="s1">'steps'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'calories'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">col_names</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="iii.-Data-Cleaning">iii. Data Cleaning<a class="anchor-link" href="#iii.-Data-Cleaning">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Data Cleaning has been performed in the following steps to ease the process for creating the visualizations later.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Ignore the swimming activity, only 1 row </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">450</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Convert Elliptical to Cardio </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Elliptical"</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">384</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Ignore Walking as an activity </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [8]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Walking"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Ignore swimming as an activity as only 3 recorded activities </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Lap Swimming"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Lap Swimming"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Activity type Strength Training was recording as Others in older Garmin Devices </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [10]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">214</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">221</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">223</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">242</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Other"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Strength Training"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Activity Types Indoor Rowing and Indoor Cycling also included as Cardio </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [11]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Indoor Rowing"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityType</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"Indoor Cycling"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Correcting Data Errors and Data Types </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [12]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Strength Training"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"actDistance"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Strength Training"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"elevationGain"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Strength Training"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"avgSpeed"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Strength Training"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"steps"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"actDistance"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"elevationGain"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"avgSpeed"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityType"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s2">"Cardio"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"steps"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"avgHR"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"avgHR"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'--'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"maxHR"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"maxHR"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'--'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"steps"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"steps"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'--'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">NaN</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"steps"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">steps</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'avgHR'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">avgHR</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'maxHR'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">maxHR</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'steps'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">steps</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [14]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">

<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">loc</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="mi">456</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">495</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="s2">"elevationGain"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">328</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"elevationGain"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">elevationGain</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'elevationGain'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">elevationGain</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"avgSpeed"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">avgSpeed</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">":"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"."</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"avgSpeed"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">avgSpeed</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"--.--"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'0.0'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'avgSpeed'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">avgSpeed</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'actDistance'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">actDistance</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"calories"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">calories</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">","</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'calories'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">calories</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="input_area">

<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">frame</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"index"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"vis1.csv"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<h3 id="v.-Data-Transformations">v. Data Transformations<a class="anchor-link" href="#v.-Data-Transformations">¶</a></h3>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Creating Derived Fields that can be used for the visualizations. The transformations have been highlighted.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Converting startTime to Python DateTime Format to use the inbuilt functions </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [18]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"startTime"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_datetime</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"startTime"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="c1">#running_data.head()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Concatenating information about the Month and Year for every activity to the DataFrame </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [19]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityMonth"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">startTime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">month</span>
<span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityDay"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">startTime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dayofweek</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [20]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityMonthName"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityMonth</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"January"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"February"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"March"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"April"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                                   <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"May"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"June"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"July"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"August"</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                                                   <span class="mi">9</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"September"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"October"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"November"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"December"</span><span class="p">})</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [21]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityDayName"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityDay</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">map</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Monday"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Tuesday"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Wednesday"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Thursday"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                                                                   <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Friday"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Saturday"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">"Sunday"</span><span class="p">})</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Obtaining Activitiy Levels using the average HR field for all the workouts </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [22]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">## To-Do : Divide the Heart Rate Zones from the data into Zones and create a new column</span>
<span class="c1"># < 114 - Very Light</span>
<span class="c1"># 114-133 - Light</span>
<span class="c1"># 133-152 - Moderate</span>
<span class="c1"># 152-171 - Hard</span>
<span class="c1"># >171 - Very Hard</span>
<span class="c1">## do using lambda: apply a function</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">get_hr_zones</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">avgHR</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">math</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">isnan</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">avgHR</span><span class="p">):</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Not Recorded"</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">114</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Very Light"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">114</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">133</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Light"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">133</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">152</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Moderate"</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">152</span> <span class="ow">and</span> <span class="n">avgHR</span> <span class="o"><</span> <span class="mi">171</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Hard"</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s2">"Very Hard"</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [23]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityLevel"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">avgHR</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">get_hr_zones</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Calculating total minutes of an activity from the data </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [24]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">getMinutes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">activityTime</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">curr_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">activityTime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">":"</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">final_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"."</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
<span class="c1">#         print curr_time</span>
        <span class="n">mins</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="mi">60</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">])</span>
        <span class="n">final_time</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mins</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">"."</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">curr_time</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">final_time</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [25]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityMins"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">activityTime</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">getMinutes</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityMins"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"activityMins"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"float"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [26]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">drop</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"activityTime"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axis</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">inplace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="c1">#running_data.head()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [27]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1">#running_data.head()</span>
<span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"vis2.csv"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Checking final data types </strong></p>
</div>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dtypes</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="output_wrapper">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Creating a list of continuous and categorical variable </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [29]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">categorical_vars</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">include</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"object"</span><span class="p">])</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
<span class="n">continuous_vars</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="vi.-Summary-of-Continuous-Variables-and-Missing-Data-Analysis">vi. Summary of Continuous Variables and Missing Data Analysis<a class="anchor-link" href="#vi.-Summary-of-Continuous-Variables-and-Missing-Data-Analysis">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> The summary of continuous variables helps us figure out the count of values for all the variables where the values are present. It helps us explore the number of missing values for the variables and begin the analysis of MISSING DATA </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [30]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Looking at the count of values for all the continuous variables, we observe that out of 494 activities, 211 activities had distance recorded, 80 activities had elevationGains recorded, the average speed was recorded for 211 activities, with average and max Heart Rate being recorded for 336 activities. </strong></p>
<p><strong> Calories, Activity Month, Activity Day and the Activity Minutes were recorded for all the activities </strong></p>
<p><strong>Some of the reasons for missing data are as follows</strong>:</p>
<ol>
<li>During the span of 5 years, I have changed 4 wearable devices. Initially I used the Garmin Vivofit tracker for all the runs, which did not have heart rate tracker. </li>
<li>After that I bought the Garmin Forerunner 920 (GPS inbuilt), which had a heart rate strap along with it and it also used to calculate the elevationGain and many more parameters for all the runs. But I do realize that I was lazy to use the heart rate strap as it needed to be washed after every run.</li>
<li>After that I used the Garmin Vivofit2 tracker, which had inbuilt heart rate monitor but lacked GPS, so the runs were still being tracked by Garmin Forerunner 920 and whenever were tracked using Vivofit2, lacked heart rate information.</li>
<li>Currently I am using the Garmin Vivoactive HR, which has an wrist HR monitor as well as an inbuilt GPS, but being in Graduate School, the frequency of runs has gone down significantly.</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> All the variables in the analysis are important but lets do an initial missing data analysis with visualizations </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> <em>Visualization : Missing Data 1</em> </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [31]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">running_data_continuous</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">describe</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [32]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">%%</span>R <span class="o">-</span>i running_data_continuous <span class="o">-</span>w <span class="m">900</span> <span class="o">-</span>h <span class="m">480</span> <span class="o">-</span>u px

<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>vcd<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>dplyr<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>readr<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>grid<span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># for gpar</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>RColorBrewer<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>scales<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>knitr<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>mi<span class="p">)</span>

image<span class="p">(</span>missing_data.frame<span class="p">(</span>running_data_continuous<span class="p">))</span>

<span class="kp">rm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kp">ls</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

</div>

<p><strong> <em>Visualization : Missing Data 2</em> </strong></p>

<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="o">%%</span>R <span class="o">-</span>i running_data_continuous <span class="o">-</span>w <span class="m">900</span> <span class="o">-</span>h <span class="m">480</span> <span class="o">-</span>u px

<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>vcd<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>dplyr<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>grid<span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># for gpar</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>RColorBrewer<span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"VIM"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"mice"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">library</span><span class="p">(</span>lattice<span class="p">)</span>

aggr_plot <span class="o"><-</span> aggr<span class="p">(</span>running_data_continuous<span class="p">,</span> col<span class="o">=</span><span class="kt">c</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">'skyblue'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s">'red'</span><span class="p">),</span> numbers<span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">TRUE</span><span class="p">,</span> sortVars<span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">TRUE</span><span class="p">,</span> labels<span class="o">=</span><span class="kp">names</span><span class="p">(</span>running_data_continuous<span class="p">),</span> cex.axis<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">.7</span><span class="p">,</span> gap<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">3</span><span class="p">,</span> ylab<span class="o">=</span><span class="kt">c</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"Heatmap of missing data"</span><span class="p">),</span> combined<span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">TRUE</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kp">rm</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kt">list</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kp">ls</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> Looking at the above visualization, the following patterns emerge: </strong></p>
<ol>
<li>Average Heart Rate and Maximum Heart Rate values are missing for those specific Activities where I was using a fitness tracker which did not have Heart Rate Tracking ability.</li>
<li>The statistics like Elevation Gain were tracked when I was using a heart rate strap attached, which being lazy I didn't use often, leading to the highest number of missing values, because of which we will <strong>not consider it as an important feature in our analysis.</strong></li>
<li>For the first generation fitness tracker used like Garmin Vivofit 1 and 2, even though it had capabilities to record my Running Distance based on the number of steps take, it still did not process the other metrics like Average Speed and Heart rate values.</li>
<li>Also, the Running Distance values are missing for all workouts which involved Strength Training. <em>If there was some recorded value for this field during Strength Training sessions due to the number of steps taken, it has been ignored and replaced with NaNs in my analysis.</em></li>
<li>Steps were recorded by the most recent fitness trackers used and therefore have a lot of missing values. During activities not involving Running, the Steps have not been considered and replaced with NaNs.</li>
</ol>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> From the above analysis, it can be seen that the most important features for further analysis are <code>Activity Minutes</code>, <code>Activity Month</code>, <code>Activity Day</code>, <code>Calories Burnt</code>, <code>Average Heart Rate</code>, <code>Maximum Heart Rate</code>, <code>Activity Distance Covered</code>. The other features, specifically, <code>Average Speed</code> , <code>Steps</code> and <code>Elevation Gain</code> have a higher number of missing values and will not be considered important for future analysis, even though <code>Average Speed</code> and <code>Steps</code> can help me analyze the runs and find some correlations. </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p><strong> <em>Visualizing Distribution of Continuous Variables</em> </strong></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [34]:</div>

</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="vi.-Visualizing-Distribution-of-Categorical-Variables">vi. Visualizing Distribution of Categorical Variables<a class="anchor-link" href="#vi.-Visualizing-Distribution-of-Categorical-Variables">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [35]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">categorical_vars</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">
<div class="output_area">
<div class="prompt"></div>
<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>Index(['activityType', 'activityMonthName', 'activityDayName',
       'activityLevel'],
      dtype='object')
</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [36]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Count plots of categorical variables</span>

<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">axes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">16</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots_adjust</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">left</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">bottom</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">right</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">top</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wspace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hspace</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.3</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">enumerate</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">axes</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ravel</span><span class="p">()):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_visible</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">continue</span>
    <span class="n">sns</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">countplot</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">categorical_vars</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">running_data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">ax</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

ycvLw9/fH39/f86dO6erUxNCCCGEEEL8AekZJoQQQgghhBCiyktPT2f69Onk5eVhbGxMYGAg6enp
xMXFsWTJEqysrIiIiCA7OxtTU1MiIiJo164ds2bN4u7du9y5c4f8/HymTZuGs7MziYmJLFq0CBMT
